prop.name: geoRadius
prop.desc: Indicates the approximate radius of a GeoCircle (metres unless indicated otherwise via Distance notation).

prop.name: geoMidpoint
prop.desc: Indicates the GeoCoordinates at the centre of a GeoShape e.g. GeoCircle.

GeoShape.name: line
GeoShape.desc: A line is a point-to-point path consisting of two or more points. A line is expressed as a series of two or more point objects separated by space.

GeoShape.name: circle
GeoShape.desc: A circle is the circular region of a specified radius centered at a specified latitude and longitude. A circle is expressed as a pair followed by a radius in meters.

GeoShape.name: box
GeoShape.desc: A box is the area enclosed by the rectangle formed by two points. The first point is the lower corner, the second point is the upper corner. A box is expressed as two points separated by a space character.

GeoShape.name: addressCountry
GeoShape.desc: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

GeoShape.name: polygon
GeoShape.desc: A polygon is the area enclosed by a point-to-point path for which the starting and ending points are the same. A polygon is expressed as a series of four or more space delimited points where the first and final points are identical.
